title: Ticket #920: Startd crash can leak VMs
description: When the Startd starts it removes everything under the EXECUTE directory, but first checks for .recover files. The .recover file contains the job ad of the running job. If the job was a VM job, the startd will invoke the condor_vm-gahp in "KillMode". KillMode eventually invokes VirshType::killVMFast to terminate the VMs. However, on 26 Aug 09 (155e821), the killVMFast function was commented out. The result being the Startd's attempt is effectively ignored. The end result is libvirt VMs are left running after a startd restart after a crash.
